name: Daiquiri
description: A classic Cuban cocktail that perfectly balances rum, fresh lime juice, and simple syrup. Served straight up in a chilled cocktail coupe.
instructions:
1. Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice
2. Shake vigorously until well-chilled
3. Double strain into a chilled cocktail coupe
4. No garnish is traditional, but a lime wheel is optional
